title: Enchanted Secrets
description: Kendra lives in the shadow of her twin sister Kala, who is not only thinner, but one of the most popular girls in high school. Kendra struggles with the death of her father, her ballooning weight, and taunts from the cruel kids at school. Then one day, she meets a mysterious stranger named Tyler, who introduces her to a world of magic and witchcraft that is both exhilarating and frightening.
author: Kristen Middleton
